name: scanbot-web-sdk
title: Web Scan SDK
description: Scanbot Web Document and Barcode Scanner SDK

scripts.build: npm run build-lib && npm run build-src
scripts.build:docker: npm run build-lib:docker && npm run build-src
scripts.dev-build: npm run dev-build-lib && npm run dev-build-src
scripts.build-src: npx webpack --mode production && mkdir -p internal-dev-app/data && date '+%a %b %d %Y %H:%M:%S GMT%z (%Z)' >> internal-dev-app/data/src-build-date.txt
scripts.dev-build-src: npx webpack --mode development && mkdir -p internal-dev-app/data && date '+%a %b %d %Y %H:%M:%S GMT%z (%Z)' >> internal-dev-app/data/src-build-date.txt
scripts.create-npm-package: rm -rf component && npm run transpile && npm pack
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build-lib && npm run transpile && npm run cp-typings && npm run build-src && rm bundle/ScanbotSDK.min.js.LICENSE.txt
scripts.dev-pack: npm run clean-src && npm run transpile && npm run dev-build-src && npm pack --ignore-scripts

author: Scanbot / doo GmbH
